title: Very expensive for the value
text:
One of my worst traveling experience!A bad aesthetics hotel in the middle of fields.. in the middle of nowhere.. that costs 120€ per night!!! if you are so unlucky to be obliged to be at the area on full season for the wonderful traditional hotels of the historical city of Xanthi!!
Even if it’s too expensive the room.. without any obvious reason... they charge even the coffee at the breakfast!!!

title: Typical touristic and must visit
text: A crowded touristic area that you must visit for the traditional shops the antique shops the neighboring with Plaka (the area of old Athens) etc

title: Nice area with interesting hot spors
text: A nice area with perfect view when you are at a terrace narrow streets with typical architecture of the old Athens and with nice bars and restaurants

title: Cheap but not the best
text: Cheap for Maldives but not the best of the lagoon! Especially if you stay at the male’s side you will smell all the garbage of the city... Also not all the rooms have access to nice sea... so be careful what you choose

title: Nice but far away from the city w
text: A nice hotel with perfect designed and decorated rooms! Good value for money! Nice roof bar and restaurant! The only problem the (not walking) distance from the city center! But convenient if you have car

title: The landmark of the byzantine city
text:
Must visit as this is the most historical landmark of the city situated at the seafront and well seen from the sea..
A castle when it was built and a prison in ottoman era / a nice museum today...
Must visit it

title: Nice for finger seafood
text: Nice “ouzeri” but not high quality of food... Good for a sunny midday tsipouro if you are around.. The behavior and the not that clean look of the waiters is my biggest problem

title: Nice pizza
text: I do like to eat pizza there as it seems one of the best in the city for italian food... Also like the outside area

title: Excellent food
text: A place to be only for the food as the inside and the atmosphere in general is not my favorite because of the poor decoration and the lack of well designed openair area... But its nice for traditional greek food and not expensive

title: One of my favorite
text: A different way of eating.. Nice place with perfect food and interesting industrial decoration... Highly recommended if you want to taste traditional but fusion greek food

title: HALL OF FAME NOT A MUSEUM
text: Its a pity to name a clear Hall of Fame as a museum... So I went expecting to visit museum but it was not a real one... Fake that made me angry

title: The modern landmark of the city
text: Of course the white tower is the official landmark of the city.. but this sculpture especially at sunset is unique! Don’t miss a souvenir photo there while enjoying a nice promenade at the new seafront of the city

title: Not the best Experience...
text:
Simple but Nice colorful decoration
Not elegant service
Not the best value for money
Not at all recommended
Thessaloniki is full of nice restaurants

title: Breathless view
text: Elegant aristocratic with one of the best views in Athens! A bit expensive but its really good experience

title: Nice place
text: A nice and a bit special restaurant... expensive food but nice atmosphere... Not my first choice while visiting Athens but always a safe one

title: ATMOSPHERIC
text: A nice theater that reminds you the old era of Athens so it’s really worth while to watch a theatrical show there

title: Landmark
text:
Almost crazy to visit Athens and ignore the historical world wide landmark of Acropolis and Parthenon...
The birth of our civilization so don’t miss it

title: Excellent
text: Perfect in everything... The place the view the service the chef the dishes all together a unique - even expensive- experience! Try the degustation menu and relax while enjoying an explosion of flavors

title: Nice place at a historical area
text:
A great area (Ladadika) to walk around and feel the history of the city.. Paraty a nice place with beautiful decoration where you can enjoy a drink..
Highly recommended

title: Must visit
text: Unique and historical as there happened the first modern Olympic Games... You feel the spirit.. Really impressive

title: One of my best all days bar
text: I really like it as it can offer you a pleasant and elegant atmosphere through out the day and night time.. Nice music a bit crowded but really nice

title: One of my favorite sushi restaurants
text: One of my favorite sushi restaurants in Athens... Very expensive but really excellent food in a perfect decor!

title: My favorite at the city center
text: A nice Peruvian style restaurant with Peru influences food and perfect decor that makes it an oasis in the hot city center

title: VERY GOOD LOCATION BUT A BIT EXPENSIVE COMPARED WITH OTHERS AT THE SAME AREA
text: A nice hotel with very helpful and pleasant staff in a good and convenient location! But while being there I found much more convenient hotels in amazing better prices.. as the Koreanna one which was just opposite to hop on hop of buses and close to the main square that leads ti the palaces..

title: Must to visit at least one of the shopping centers
text: Must to visit at least one of the shopping centers especially the night ones! Unique experience and not that known... its a great surprise while getting informed about the sight seeing of this wonderful city

title: Must to visit at least one of the shopping centers
text: Must to visit at least one of the shopping centers and mostly the night ones that are unique experience! Try the most popular depending on your interests

title: Impressive gate
text: One of the many traditional and historical gates of the city that welcomes you to the past while standing in the middle of the modern technology of the present

title: Nice palace
text: A worthwhile visit after the Gyengong palace.. If you are lucky you will find a cultural event while walking around

title: Not the first to visit
text: Not the first to visit and of course be sure that you will enjoy a clear sky otherwise you will loose the reason to go all this way up to the hill.. the breathless view of seoul...

title: Amazing especially at noon
text: Nice and worthwhile visit to the best palace complex of the city.. Try to have a sunset visit that will give you a unique and less crowded experience

title: Not the best choice
text:
Difficult to evaluate as we didn’t order a lot... but even like this nothing was worth while and tasty... The service was good and the waiters too polite but it’s not enough..
Situated in a nice pedestrian street its a pity to be that bad...

title: nice museum with interesting historical exhibits
text: nice museum with interesting historical exhibits.. nice to visit and learn about the past of this culture but also because of the cultural open air events

title: Must to see it just for fun
text: A trendy landmark of seoul that if you have enough time you must visit it... not only because it has fun but also of the great interest of the area.. with nice skyscrapers and mall and a special museum dedicated to the modern design

title: A bit confusing but with english translated signs and the best way of quick traveling
text:
A bit confusing but with english translated signs and the best way of quick traveling ..
A tip is to take photos of your start point as well as from your willing destination and you will survive..

title: Great museum worth while to visit
text:
Unique in Greece promoting the Olympic values through the permanent adorable and educative exhibitions and more throughout educational programs and cultural activities..
Presents the Olympic history through personal items of Olympic winners athletes and collectors!
Must see it

title: Worth while as you easily explore the city especially if you don’t have a lot of time
text: Worth while as you easily explore the city especially if you don’t have a lot of time... The only problem is the change of the routes that is not that obvious and clear at the flyer.. So we were confused and lost stops while counting at the schedule of the given flyer.
place: Seoul Combo: 2-Day Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour (Downtown Palace, Panorama and Gangnam Course)

title: The worst ever
text: A huge sized and confusing as a shopping mall and expensive hotel with small smelling and bad decorated rooms.. My stay was payed from my hosts but unfortunately I had to extend my stay for one night... So they charged me 60€ more than I found the room at the booking.com!! I emailed the manager to help me but nobody really cares to satisfy the client! Moreover they don’t speak english and this would not be a big problem if they would just tell you... They all shaked their heads as like they do understand and you have to wait until you finally discover that wait without any result... They made me crazy while trying to make their job in SLOW MOTION

title: Nice even expensive experience
text: A nice hotel that offers a new experience in your stay! Cocomat is my favorite brand that already use in my home so I really felt like home! A bit expensive but worth to stay at least once...At the heart of the city center

title: Old fashioned hotel
text: An old fashioned hotel with not the best quality of food (mass bufet...) but a really helpful and smily staff ! Good facilities but without a great quality.. Goof for cheap and mass tourism at the beach

title: Luxurious and expensive but one of the little nice
text: Luxurious and expensive but one of the little nice cafes and restaurants in Nicosia... Nice sweets and great decoration

title: Traditional and cozy
text: A nice traditional restaurant one of the best in Pafos where you can enjoy local food in a cozy environment

title: Nice food and cozy decoration
text: Quite nice restaurant with tasty food and cozy decoration... especially at noon time.. I will go again for susre
